tei:transcription.tei:p: {recto} [preprinted form with handwritten address information:] Deutsche Reichspost Postkarte
An Herrn Dr. [/] Heinrich Schenker in Wien III Wohnung Fraungasse 1
{verso} [handwritten message with stamp at bottom] Berlin W.9. Koethenerstr. 27 II. 29.11.92.

mit bestem Dank theile ich Ihnen mit, daß der Artikel in Nr. 10 erscheint. Schenker’s second article for Harden, “Eine jung-italienische Schule?”, Die Zukunft, December 3, 1892, reprinted Hellmut Federhofer, Heinrich Schenker als Essayist und Kritiker (Hildesheim: Olms, 1990), pp. 31–34. Es wird mich sehr interessiren, wenn Sie mir Neues senden wollen; was Sie andeuten, klingt ja verlockend genug.

Ihr Urtheil In “Mascagni in Wien,” Schenker does not himself compare Bellincioni with Duse, but he notes a comparison made by the Vienna opera audiences: “The significance of genius manifested by this young lady (our public dubbed her ‘the singing Duse’) can hardly be measured today.”; reprinted in Hellmut Federhofer, Heinrich Schenker als Essayist und Kritiker (Hildesheim: Olms, 1990),p. 29.) The critical judgment about Duse must have occurred in some other correspondence from Schenker to Harden. über die Bellincioni| The Italian soprano Gemma Bellincioni (1864-1950) premiered the role of Santuzza in Mascagni’s Cavalleria Rusticana. Schenker’s first article for Harden, “Mascagni in Wien,” Die Zukunft October 15, 1892, reviewed her recent performance of the role in Vienna. unterschreibe ich; sie ist im kleinen Finger genialer als die ganze Duse. Italian actress Eleonora Duse (1858-1924).
In ausgezeichneter Hochachtung Ihr ergebener [signed:] Harden

tei:translation.tei:p: {recto} [preprinted form with handwritten address information:] German Imperial Post Postcard
To Dr. Heinrich Schenker in Vienna III Address Fraungasse 1
{verso} [handwritten message with stamp at bottom] Berlin W. 9, 27 Koethenerstraße II November 29, 1892
With many thanks I am letting you know that the article will appear in No. 10. I would be very interested if you wished to send me something new; what you suggest certainly sounds intriguing enough.
I concur with your judgment about Bellincioni; she has more talent in her little finger than Duse has in her whole body.
In highest esteem, Yours truly, [signed:] Harden
